title: ‘It’s a Calculated Risk:’: Inside the Transfer of the Season and How Q36.5 Landed Tom Pidcock
content:
Pidcock traded the sure bet of the WorldTour for the chance to start something new at Q36.5. How did the deal go down? ‘We all knew it was a game-changer.’

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Calculated Risk:’: Inside the Transfer of the Season and How Q36.5 Landed Tom Pidcock on Velo.
author: ahood
